meanings.definition: Promoting excessive weight gain or obesity.
meanings.sent1: The fast-food restaurant offers many obesogenic meals.
meanings.sent2: Regular consumption of sugary drinks can lead to an obesogenic lifestyle.
meanings.sent3: The obesogenic cupcakes were so tempting that I couldn't resist having one.
meanings.sent4: The obesogenic environment in the city made it challenging to maintain a healthy weight.
meanings.sent5: The obesogenic advertisements made unhealthy snacks seem irresistible.

meanings.definition: A factor or environment that contributes to obesity.
meanings.sent1: Living in a food desert can create an obesogenic situation for many people.
meanings.sent2: Schools play a role in either promoting or reducing obesogenic environments for students.
meanings.sent3: The park's obesogenic atmosphere made everyone crave ice cream.
meanings.sent4: The workplace cafeteria was an obesogenic trap for those trying to eat healthily.
meanings.sent5: The obesogenic neighborhood lacked safe places for outdoor activities.
